text: Nay but We provided comforts for these and their fathers in the way of the graces which We bestowed on them until life lasted long for them so that they were deluded by such longevity. Do they not see how We visit the land how We target their land diminishing it at its edges? by granting the Prophet victory through conquest. Are they the ones who will prevail? No it is rather the Prophet and his Companions who will do so.
